summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank, is coordinating the meeting and discusses potential dates. The email indicates that Epstein will not be available on the initially proposed date of October 8, 2013.

events.title: Rescheduled Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: The meeting with Jeffrey Epstein is suggested to be rescheduled to October 10, 2013.
